Dear Jury,

Thank you for being part of this journey. I believe I deserve your vote because I have consistently demonstrated strategic thinking and adaptability throughout the game. I’ve forged meaningful connections and navigated challenges with integrity. While P5 is a worthy opponent, I’ve shown a commitment to fairness and collaboration. P3, on the other hand, has shown a tendency to shift alliances for personal gain, which undermines trust. By keeping me, you ensure a winner who values fairness and respect in this competition. Thank you for considering my perspective.
